title: Start

left.text: Take the road on the left

right.text: Take the road less traveled by

body:
Two roads diverge in the wood,
And you can not travel both.

title: Forest Fork

left.text: Follow the road on the left

right.text: Follow the road on the right

body:
Another fork in the road.
Decisions, decisions.

title: Forest Dead End
body: Alas, the lack of travelers has made this road impassable.

title: Character
body: Well look at you. I didn't think I'd ever see another biped be able to move again. After the great silence, i assumed everyone had frozen where they were. Statues to be gawked at in the distant future....

title: Character

right.text: You sure do talk a lot

body: But what a welcomed surprise you are! And especially in your condition. Breathing, Moving! You've got it all! Just try not to let it get to your head. I've got no use for a egotist!

title: Character
body: Well despite your obviously inflated self-worth, I'm gonna go on a limb and let you help me.

title: Character

left.text: That's not demanding of you at all...

right.text: Well, I guess I could do that for a price

body: There is a structure further in the forest that once filled the air with beautiful music for miles. But it hasn't made so much as a peep in ages. The air has gotten stale and the relative silence has had just made everyone so uninspired we're all practically useless. You need to go in there and fix it!

title: Character
body: I'm so glad you're willing to help! Oh and take this helix horn! It's a little creepy in there and there is nothing like a little music to ease the tension of an unsettling atmosphere.

title: Temple Entrance
body: You're not sure if what you're looking at is a building, a giant, or a musical instrument but there "is" a door in front of you.

title: Temple Fork

left.text: Go in the door to the left

right.text: Go in the door to the right

body: The sounds of creaking gears and hissing pipes reverberate around the damp, stone room.

title: Temple Dead End
body: It seems the hallway has collapsed up ahead.

title: Temple Fork 2

left.text: Go in the door to the left

right.text: Go in the door to the right

body: More creaking and hissing. You also notice a low, ominous hum coming from the door to the right.

title: Locked Door
body: There only seems to be hissing pipes and a door that's barred shut in this room.

title: Unlocked Door
body: There seem to be some hissing pipes and a door in this room.

title: Switch
body: There are some weird mechanisms in here and some foreign graffiti on the wall.

title: Temple Hallway
body: You hear music playing up ahead...

title: Heart Room
body: Thank you for getting my air flow back together in a reasonable way! Now I can move this big lumbering mass to start pumping out sounds to all of the forest. I can't imagine how long it's been since anyone heard this song last. Take a listen and pick out a few notes yourself!
